jobDescription: JOB DESCRIPTION: -In this position, the candidate will be responsible for supporting small scale purifications to produce material for analytical characterization. -Responsibilities will includes lab scale chromatographic processes, use of analytical techniques (such as HPLC and UV), and liquid handling automation. -Candidate will work as member of a team to solve technical problems related to purification of proteins and analytical troubleshooting. -Other responsibilities include planning, maintaining inventory of key reagents, writing technical reports, and presenting technical data. Qualifications:BS degree in Biological Sciences/Chemical Engineering/Biological Engineering/Biochemistry or related field.Basic understanding of purification unit operations and HPLC analytics, ability to multi-taskPreferred Skills: Basic understanding of biochemical/biophysical properties of proteins, lab based research experience
